subtitle: Shield for India
title: AI-Powered Misinformation
description: Our AI-driven website and app help you spot fake news, edited images, and deepfake videos instantly. By using advanced language processing, image analysis, and video forensics, we verify content and uncover misinformation. Just upload any media, and we’ll check its credibility—making the digital world more transparent and trustworthy!
detect_fake_news: Detect fake news, manipulated photos, and
identify_fake_transcripts: Identify and expose fake or altered transcripts
identify_fake_posts: Identify and expose fake or altered social media posts
